snippet: Noah Syndergaard, a right-handed pitcher, is expected to make his major league debut sometime this season and eventually become a key member of the rotation alongside Matt Harvey and Zack Wheeler.
abstract: Noah Syndergaard, one of the most highly regarded pitching prospects in baseball, is expected to make his debut with the New York Mets this season and eventually become a key member of team's rotation alongside Matt Harvey and Zack Wheeler.
lead_paragraph: Noah Syndergaard, a right-handed pitcher, is expected to make his major league debut sometime this season and eventually become a key member of the rotation alongside Matt Harvey and Zack Wheeler.

headline.seo: Noah Syndergaard Is Hard to Miss on a Playing Field
headline.main: The Mets’ Future Strikes a Presence
headline.print_headline: The Mets’ Future Strikes a Presence
